00022 #ifndef HYPERTABLE_STOPWATCH_H
00023 #define HYPERTABLE_STOPWATCH_H
00024 
00025 #include <cstring>
00026 
00027 #include <boost/thread/xtime.hpp>
00028 
00029 namespace Hypertable {
00030 
00034   class Stopwatch {
00035   public:
00036 
00037     Stopwatch(bool start_running=true) : m_running(false) {
00038       memset(&elapsed_time, 0, sizeof(elapsed_time));
00039       if (start_running)
00040         start();
00041     }
00042 
00043     void start() {
00044       if (!m_running) {
00045         boost::xtime_get(&start_time, boost::TIME_UTC);
00046         m_running = true;
00047       }
00048     }
00049 
00050     void stop() {
00051       if (m_running) {
00052         boost::xtime stop_time;
00053         boost::xtime_get(&stop_time, boost::TIME_UTC);
00054         if (start_time.sec == stop_time.sec)
00055           elapsed_time.nsec += stop_time.nsec - start_time.nsec;
00056         else {
00057           elapsed_time.sec += stop_time.sec - start_time.sec;
00058           elapsed_time.nsec += (1000000000L - start_time.nsec) + stop_time.nsec;
00059           if (elapsed_time.nsec > 1000000000L) {
00060             elapsed_time.sec += elapsed_time.nsec / 1000000000L;
00061             elapsed_time.nsec %= 1000000000L;
00062           }
00063         }
00064         m_running = false;
00065       }
00066     }
00067 
00068     void reset() { memset(&elapsed_time, 0, sizeof(elapsed_time)); }
00069 
00070     double elapsed() {
00071       if (m_running) {
00072         stop();
00073         start();
00074       }
00075       return (double)elapsed_time.sec
00076             + ((double)elapsed_time.nsec / 1000000000.0);
00077     }
00078 
00079   private:
00080     bool m_running;
00081     boost::xtime start_time;
00082     boost::xtime elapsed_time;
00083   };
00084 
00085 }
00086 
00087 #endif // HYPERTABLE_STOPWATCH_H
